title: Leblanc Mid
body: So if you are playing leblanc and enemy jungler is eve. Is there anything you should be cautious of? Or can Evelyn gank LB hard? Problem is {{champion:28}}  is invisible and can just appear right behind you.

replies.body:
Blink out...E chain the bitch if for some reason that doesn't work.

Le blanc is extremely hard to gank.

> [{quoted}](name=Moulin Rouge,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=U3hytOiV,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-11-02T00:01:11.976+0000)
>
> Blink out...E chain the bitch if for some reason that doesn't work.
> 
> Le blanc is extremely hard to gank.

What about when you are roaming and are in the jungle and {{champion:28}}  appears? Do you blink away or fight her?
spam laugh and blink out of there
I used to have problems being ganked by eve, but ever since I purchased my Gunnar Glasses I see every gank coming.

How to deal with an Evelynn gank as LeBlanc?
Just Q R W the bitch and see how her HP drops to 0. Have fun.

Imo it depends? Are you really good at landing your E? Yes. Go for it

Are you bad at landing your E? No. Just blink away.

> [{quoted}](name=Moulin Rouge,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=U3hytOiV,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-11-02T00:26:15.432+0000)
>
> Imo it depends? Are you really good at landing your E? Yes. Go for it
> 
> Are you bad at landing your E? No. Just blink away.

Also depends how far ahead you and they are, stuff like that.

Junglers gank efficiency depends on the laners. When I try to gank a LB I let my laner know that I cannot do it unless they force a W from LB. once an LB uses W, she a lot like any other immobile Champion. Her R is only reliable after using W.

So eve can easily gank her if your lane can bait out a W from her

> [{quoted}](name=xJLx MCHammer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=U3hytOiV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-01T22:30:43.231+0000)
>
> Junglers gank efficiency depends on the laners. When I try to gank a LB I let my laner know that I cannot do it unless they force a W from LB. once an LB uses W, she a lot like any other immobile Champion. Her R is only reliable after using W.
> 
> So eve can easily gank her if your lane can bait out a W from her

Doesn't LB have E, she can just chain eve no?

Also I am asking from a leblancs perspective, if you were playing lb mid, how would you deal with an evelyn.
